import React from 'react' function Confirm() { let todayMonth = (new Date().getMonth()) //get current month let todayDay = new Date().getDate(); //get current day let todayYear = new Date().getFullYear(); //get current year return ( <>

Purchase Confirmed!

Your Order is Set To Arrive 3 days from:

{todayMonth} {todayDay}, {todayYear}

) } export default Confirm
